speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the report by Mrs Lissy Gröner and Mrs Amalia Sartori, on behalf of the Committee on Women's Rights and Gender Equality, on the establishment of a European Institute for Gender Equality ( COM(2005)0081 -C6-0083/2005- 2005/0017(COD) ) ( A6-0043/2006 ).
original: President. – The next item is the report by Mrs Lissy Gröner and Mrs Amalia Sartori, on behalf of the Committee on Women's Rights and Gender Equality, on the establishment of a European Institute for Gender Equality ( COM(2005)0081 -C6-0083/2005- 2005/0017(COD) ) ( A6-0043/2006 ).
